name: Spell Unka (Demo)
description:
'Spell Unka' is a retro style platform exploration game demo based on the classic arcade cabinet games of the early 80's.

Inspiration has been taken from classic such as Pitfall and of course Spelunker and 80's / 90's movie, TV and game related references can be seen throughout. 

You play as Cavin' Colin an underground adventurer who, whilst exploring in the deepest, darkest jungles of Peru, has uncovered the entrance to the ancient temple of UNKA...

Who or what are the UNKA?

Only the bravest of adventurers will uncover that secret! 

The game is being developed using Gdevelop5 and started out as just a test of my abilities to create games, it was never intended to be a full release, however I am beginning to get attached to it and am considering continuing on...

Even though I know that I have an awful long way to go to make a finished project if I do decide to complete it, I'd love to hear what you guys think!

Feedback is extremely important to me, firstly to see whether you enjoy what I have created so far, but also to find out ways in which to improve, not only this project, but also any future game development that I may undertake.

Thank you for reading this, if you decide to try the demo out then thank you for playing and I hope that you enjoy it!

I'm sure there will still be a few glitches and the fullscreen toggle is currently not working as stated on screen...

Please let me know any other bugs and issues that you may encounter whilst playing the game and I will try to iron them out.
